title: cuda run time error
body_html:
CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=2 python train11.py
True
build vnet

  • Number of params: 45600316
    {'num_workers': 10, 'pin_memory': True}
    loading train dataset
    loading test set
    /home/mubo/anaconda3/plugins/3dvnet/vnet.py:132: UserWarning: Implicit dimension choice for log_softmax has been deprecated. Change the call to include dim=X as an argument.
    out = self.softmax(out)
    Train Epoch: 0.00 [2/459 (0%)] Loss: 0.8428 Error: 72.000
    THCudaCheck FAIL file=/pytorch/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensorMathPairwise.cu line=81 error=59 : device-side assert triggered
    Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "train11.py", line 270, in
    main()
    File "train11.py", line 184, in main
    train(args, epoch, model, trainLoader, optimizer, trainF)
    File "train11.py", line 215, in train_nll
    optimizer.step()
    File "/home/mubo/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/optim/adam.py", line 93, in step
    exp_avg_sq.mul_(beta2).addcmul_(1 - beta2, grad, grad)
    RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (59) : device-side assert triggered at /pytorch/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensorMathPairwise.cu:81
    /pytorch/aten/src/THCUNN/ClassNLLCriterion.cu:105: void cunn_ClassNLLCriterion_updateOutput_kernel(Dtype *, Dtype *, Dtype *, long *, Dtype *, int, int, int, int, long) [with Dtype = float, Acctype = float]: block: [0,0,0], thread: [0,0,0] Assertion t >= 0 && t < n_classes failed.

please see this error
